alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 30 at 1:19AM CDT until October 30 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding. * WHERE...Mobile Inland, Baldwin Inland, Mobile Central and Baldwin Central Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Lowest portions of the US 90/98 Causeway at the I-10 Interchange begin to observe splashover and standing water resulting in minor flooding around the eastbound I-10 on-ramps. Some minor flooding of parking lots in that area as well. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Water levels are near the threshold for minor coastal flooding along northern sections of Mobile Bay, particularly along the Causeway near the I-10 Interchange. No flooding has been reported as of yet, but coastal flood guidance indicates that water levels could possibly rise another half foot or so by the time of high tide this morning, which will be generally around 3 AM for sections of northern Mobile Bay.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland
